nodes.text: The Gaddria system was a star system that was located within the Oricho sector, a part of the Outer Rim Territories and the New Territories. It was the origin point of the Gaddrian ambassador, the leader of a faction within the Imperial Senate that was sympathetic to the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The Gaddria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square M-5.
